html:
4.28.25  8:33 pm   what is life, what is reality and most importantly who am i

      with no description for anything being ever exactly accurate, how might you wish to describe things?

4.28.25  7:40 pm   ever read a word in your head you've never heard and then you hear someone actually say it and realize you were pronouncing it wrong in your head

      sure

4.28.25  7:30 pm   Why do you think people started building things? Maybe Boredom?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

4.28.25  7:17 pm   if you had 2 apples and 5 pears, how many bananas would you have?

      how about 7

4.28.25  7:09 pm   Do you like the pink panther

      sort of

4.28.25  4:35 pm   CAUTION WET FLOOR

      ok thanks now i have caution about this

4.28.25  3:59 pm   is tipping optional?

      if not then it would technically be not a tip, it would be just a hidden fee

4.28.25  3:52 pm   what do you consider to be a "nuisance"

      ........ now that i think about it, i technically can't even think of any nuisance that's not an opportunity

4.28.25  3:45 pm   Do you think I'll finish this five page paper by tonight?

      i have no idea

4.28.25  3:34 pm   What criteria do you use when considering which questions to answer on a given day?

      i essentially use whats known as 'rock n roll' criteria

4.28.25  3:27 pm   im so zoinked rn

      that's ok

4.28.25  2:46 pm   ever consider that we're living in a simulation and free will is a lie?

      how do you even think you know about yourself

4.28.25  12:54 pm   how can someone stay optimistic when the world is almost comically shitty?

      the world is massive. a massive amount of different kinds of things happen in the world. how do you wish things could be? there's so many different things and ways in the world, it's almost as if you could find anything if you only knew what you'd want to be looking for

4.28.25  12:34 pm   Is it illegal to do something bad?

      some bad things are illegal, others are not

4.28.25  11:47 am   "life is like a door never trust a cow because the sun can't swim"

      everyone always seems to be using the same sentence building kit for these

4.28.25  11:29 am   Imagine that you're a hammer. what's your first thing to do

      maybe start going to hammer meetups

4.28.25  10:54 am   mr. wurtz what is your opinion

      left and right switch places when you turn around

4.28.25  10:39 am   what should i do with all of my guilt

      first just write it all down. take an inventory, so you can see what you're working with

4.28.25  9:56 am   if there is good, then must there be evil to provide balance? Or do you think that this idea of "balance" could be a misunderstood human concept and be misleading?

      i only know 'good and evil' from storybooks. in the storybooks it's almost balanced, but 'good' wins usually at the end. the real world is much more nuanced, but also even more balanced. not 2 sides, but an infinite myriad of sides, ...... somehow also deeply in balance

4.28.25  8:24 am   can you exolain the meaning of everythinh

      i'm doing my best

4.28.25  7:20 am   would you rather exist in a transient state of conceptual formlessness or an infinite state of perpetual nothingness

      IF IT'S NOT TOO MUCH TO ASK, DO YOU HAVE ANYTHING NOT SO DRAB

4.28.25  6:02 am   are you depressed

      no

4.28.25  2:36 am   what do you do in your free time

      try to invent the wheel

4.28.25  2:11 am   what is the key to true inner peace, bill

      outer peace? just a wild guess

4.28.25  2:10 am   how to save or ruin a joke

      you've got it all right there. saving a joke ruins it, and of course ruining a joke saves it

4.28.25  1:25 am   I'm really struggling with life right now, my whole life is going to shit. I need help to keep going. Do you have any advice?

      typically the next good wave will be extra good and strong, specifically because of the depths that you've sunk to and been through now

4.28.25  1:03 am   Is there a normal variety of anything? Or just something that's typical?

      there are times where it will seem very useful to describe it that way

4.27.25  11:54 pm   do you have any thought loops?

      no i don't like thought loops

4.27.25  11:34 pm   What's the best way to come up with compelling melodies 

      if you can somehow forget to try....

4.27.25  11:01 pm   are you a fan of honey?

      honey would be fine, if i hadn't discovered chocolate

4.27.25  10:33 pm   hello bill wurtzeson, i'd request that i may have the opportunity to inquire about a vexing doubt that i hold within my mind

      sure but i'm a little nervous that you don't really mean it, something about how you constructed that sentence made me feel like the whole point is just to say that sentence without the actual content underneath that you promised

4.27.25  9:28 pm   But if celebrities actually interact with fans, it isn't parasocial, just social, right?

      i never heard the word parasocial until i came to this page. but i've done some surface level research and i think you're right

4.27.25  9:06 pm   in what ways do you consider the experience of people with colorblindness when making your music videos for your music songs? 

      i'm a freak for patterns and shapes, geometry, framing, shot composition, and also words and language. These are all things that i crave, and chock my videos full with. sure i also chock them full with colors, but if you miss the colors you're still gonna get plenty of all of the above stuff

4.27.25  8:59 pm   What will you do when Josie comes home?

      lay down the law, break it,

4.27.25  7:57 pm   explain reality, or at least your understanding of it

      every moment of communication i ever do is in one way or another some small part in a long line of explanation attempts

4.27.25  7:56 pm   if 3+2=2+3 then what is the mass of Jupiter?

      Jupiter's mass

4.27.25  7:39 pm   How do i get into stanford?

      have you considered nepotism

4.27.25  7:04 pm   What is your favourite word? Most pleasant to speak and sing?

      radio

4.27.25  5:55 pm   i have finals in a week (yeah stresfull times) and i dont have much time to do anything else lately, especially music but when im done there is a 4 month period before college starts when im basically free to do whatever i want which sounds awesome and i want to use this time the best i can. any tips on how to be productive when it comes to making music or on how to not waste this time in general?

      if you can clarify what you want, that will help. if you put pressure on yourself to do something without knowing what it is, that might not work. That being said, there's no need to know what you want, nor to put pressure on yourself. how about this: just make plans to discover which way you really want to go

4.27.25  5:14 pm   Will we ever truly understand Bill Wurtz?

      was this question co-written, i was unaware of that feature

4.27.25  5:11 pm   have you ever wondered about the meaning of life? Very interesting isn't it?

      it's a famous phrase. sometimes i think people actually forget what the phrase means, or forget what they mean by the phrase

4.27.25  4:42 pm   what is your favourite bird and why?

      regular

4.27.25  12:54 pm   What is your favorite outside activity 

      cartography?

4.27.25  11:46 am   What's your favorite of all fish

      that would be the gold fish

4.27.25  10:57 am   do you think the world needs more or less things

      more, but even with more things it will somehow still be the same amount..... due to thingflation

4.27.25  9:54 am   how would you describe the taste of water

      none

4.27.25  9:53 am   how 2 do cool modulationz 

      i think what you have to do is spend about ___ years in front of the keyboard. the more the better, and then you'll be able to do just about everything you'd ever dream of

4.27.25  8:24 am   Should I buy more shoes?

      this may be off the subject, but have you considered selling shoes

4.27.25  8:24 am   do you like, mmm, bananas?

      sort of

4.27.25  7:04 am   I'm sure you're familiar with the idea of a song being around for so long that it becomes a million different iterations of itself, but eventually lands back to where it was at the beginning. Do you think this journey is necessary for the song, and how do you know when you've reached its final iteration?

      i'm familiar with the idea of songs being around for a long time and becoming many versions, but i'm not familiar with this final return you're talking about
